name: psrn

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cps), wceq(c1, crn(c0)))
-| wceq(c1, cdm(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cps), wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PosetRel → c1 = ran(c0))
⊣ c1 = dom(c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PosetRel → dom(c0)= ran(c0))

cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ PosetRel → c1 = ran(c0))
⊣ c1 = dom(c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ PosetRel → dom(c0)= ran(c0))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cps), wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c0)), wa(wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wceq(crn(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)))))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ PosetRel, dom(c0)= ran(c0), (dom(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∧ ran(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cps), wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))

⊣ ((dom(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∧ ran(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0)→ dom(c0)= ran(c0))

-| wi(wa(wceq(cdm(c0), cuni(cuni(c0))), wceq(crn(c0), cuni(cuni(c0)))), wceq(cdm(c0), crn(c0)))

⊣ ((dom(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0 ∧ ran(c0)= ⋃ ⋃ c0)→ dom(c0)= ran(c0))
